Medium: cotton 
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
description: Diapered field with vertical oval medallions framed by wings. The medallions enclose representations of Lindbergh's flights over New York, Paris, St. Louis, and San Diego, and a bust of Charles A. Lindbergh with a cat. Printed in violet on a tan ground.
